All Classes

Class
Description
CentimetersConversionArea
This class represents the yellow centimeters conversion box.
Command
This interface defines the execute method which is used in the ReadRequest and WriteRequest classes to output a message regarding the states of the model
ConverterApp
This class simulates a ConverterApp that converts a centimeter value to feet value, meter value and display them in corresponding views.
ConverterMenuBar
This class extends JMenuBar which represents the type Converter menu bar
ConverterPanel
This class extends JPanel which represents a ConverterPanel type
FeetConversionArea
ConcreteObserver class that receives the updates from observable class with observer pattern
Invoker
This class is used to call the execute method in the read and write
MenubarListener
This class primarily manages the action that is taken when the save input centimeters menu option is clicked or is called via the keyboard shortcut
MeterConversionArea
ConcreteObserver class that receives the updates from observable class with observer pattern
Observer
The Observer interface used to update each conversion area
ReadRequest
This class manages the read request operation using the Command interface
Request
This class defines the read and write operations for a read/write request
Subject
Observable interface that push the value to notify the observer using observer pattern
ValueToConvert
This class implements Subject interface that represents a handler for observers in the observer pattern
WriteRequest
This class manages the write request operation using the Command interface
